articles.title: Pope Francis says antisemitism 'still lurking in Europe' on visit to Hungary - NBC News
articles.description: Pope Francis has called for vigilance against antisemitism during his visit to Hungary. where he met Prime Minister Viktor Orban.
articles.content:
Pope Francis called for an end to antisemitism Sunday during an unusually short trip to Hungary, where he warned that prejudice against Jews was a "fuse that must not be allowed to burn."
